To make it a bit clear for you poor poeple who haven't managed to play on any online server:

1. Start the game through the ---> start.bat

2. When the game is running type this in the console (the window with a lot of text):

connect *IP*

I've had problem connecting to some servers.
If the game tells you the server's map differs from yours just try another IP.
